Serialized Form

  • Package com.dca.checkers.ui

    • Class com.dca.checkers.ui.CheckerBoard extends javax.swing.JButton implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      -6014690893709316364L

      • Serialized Fields

        • colorDarkTile

          java.awt.Color colorDarkTile
          The colour of the dark tiles (by default, this is black).

        • colorLightTile

          java.awt.Color colorLightTile
          The colour of the light tiles (by default, this is white).

        • colorMovablePiece

          java.awt.Color colorMovablePiece
          Color for a movable piece

        • colorNextTiles

          java.awt.Color colorNextTiles
          Color of reachable tiles from a movable piece

        • colorTileId

          java.awt.Color colorTileId
          The colour of the tile id label.

        • gameState

          GameState gameState
          The gameState of checkers that is being played on this component. The same instance is shared with @see gameState.

        • selected

          java.awt.Point selected
          The last point that the current human player selected on the checker board.

        • selectionValid

          boolean selectionValid
          The flag to determine if the selected tile is valid for the current human player

        • showMovablePieces

          boolean showMovablePieces
          Tells if movable pieces for the current player must be shown

        • showNextTiles

          boolean showNextTiles
          Tells if next tiles reachable from a movable pieces must be shown

        • showTilesId

          boolean showTilesId
          Tells if the tiles id must be shown

        • window

          CheckersWindow window
          The window containing this checker board UI component.

      • Serialized Fields

        • btnPause

          javax.swing.JButton btnPause
          The button that when clicked, pauses the game.

        • btnRedo

          javax.swing.JButton btnRedo
          The button that when clicked, redo the last move.

        • btnRest

          javax.swing.JButton btnRest
          The button that when clicked, reset the game.

        • btnResume

          javax.swing.JButton btnResume
          The button that when clicked, restarts the game if it was previously paused.

        • btnStart

          javax.swing.JButton btnStart
          The button that when clicked, starts the game.

        • btnUndo

          javax.swing.JButton btnUndo
          The button that when clicked, undo the last move.

        • chbShowMovablePieces

          javax.swing.JCheckBox chbShowMovablePieces
          Flag to show piece that the current player can move

        • chbShowNextMoves

          javax.swing.JCheckBox chbShowNextMoves
          Flag to show next moves of selected piece

        • chbTilesId

          javax.swing.JCheckBox chbTilesId
          Flag for tiles ids visibility

        • cmbPlayer1Type

          javax.swing.JComboBox<java.lang.String> cmbPlayer1Type
          The combo box that changes what type of player player 1 is.

        • cmbPlayer2Type

          javax.swing.JComboBox<java.lang.String> cmbPlayer2Type
          The combo box that changes what type of player player 2 is.

        • labelDelayValue

          javax.swing.JLabel labelDelayValue
          Used to show delay value

        • sliderDelay

          javax.swing.JSlider sliderDelay
          Slider to set delay of AI moves

        • txtAreaConsole

          javax.swing.JTextArea txtAreaConsole
          Console text area used to send messages to user

        • window

          CheckersWindow window
          The checkers window to update when an option is changed.
